mapper.update: update menu set is_del=0 where id=#{menu.id} OR superior=#{menu.id}

select.if: select * from menu where (superior is null or superior=0 ) and is_del=1

select menu.* from account join account_role on (account.id = account_role.account_id and account.is_del = 1) join role on (role.is_del = 1 and role.id = account_role.role_id) join role_menu on (role_menu.role_id = role.id) join menu on (menu.is_del = 1 and role_menu.menu_id = menu.id) where account.username = #{username} and (menu.superior is null or menu.superior=0)

select menu.* from account join account_role on (account.id = account_role.account_id and account.is_del = 1) join role on (role.is_del = 1 and role.id = account_role.role_id) join role_menu on (role_menu.role_id = role.id) join menu on (menu.is_del = 1 and role_menu.menu_id = menu.id) where account.username = #{username} and superior=#{id}
select * from menu where superior=#{id} and is_del=1
